campaigns.name: Adventure in the CDA

campaigns.context: A dystopian future where technology and virtual reality dominate.

main.description: Infiltrate the data network of a corrupt corporation to obtain sensitive information.

main.name: Saved by Technology
main.description: Use technology to rescue an ally trapped in a defective virtual reality.

side.name: Street Espionage

side.name: Beast Hunter
side.description: Hunt down a werewolf terrorizing nearby villages.
